en.bdb: ‘Whatever action provides enjoyment to Raja, I honour it.’(6)

en.bdb: Once the Rani met a handsome man whose wife she introduced tothe Raja.

ss.gurmukhi: pihlw aus dI iesqrI nUM rwjy nwl imlwieAw।

verse.gurmukhi: jb vhu purK AiDk iris BirXo ]
verse.unicode: ਜਬ ਵਹੁ ਪੁਰਖ ਅਧਿਕ ਰਿਸਿ ਭਰਿਯੋ ॥

ss.gurmukhi: jd auh purS gu`sy nwl Br igAw।

verse.gurmukhi: qb qw so XO bcn aucirXo ]7]
verse.unicode: ਤਬ ਤਾ ਸੋ ਯੌ ਬਚਨ ਉਚਰਿਯੋ ॥੭॥

en.bdb: Then she incited the man that his wife was revelling with the Raja,and taunted him of having no shame.(7)

ss.unicode: ਤਦ ਉਸ ਨਾਲ ਰਾਣੀ ਨੇ ਇਸ ਤਰ੍ਰਹਾ ਗੱਲ ਕੀਤੀ ॥੭॥
